article.title: On Sensing, Agility, and Computation Requirements for a Data-gathering Agile Robotic Vehicle

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 1 illustrates a vehicle navigating in a stochastic reward field. What does the blue cylinder represent?
choices: The target detection region of the vehicle
The reward associated with a target

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Table 1, how does the required sensing range (S) scale with the mission length (L) for light-tailed distributed rewards?
choices: S converges to a finite constant.

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 2(a) depicts a two-dimensional regular lattice. What does each node in this lattice represent?
choices: The reward associated with a target
A possible state of the vehicle
A step in the vehicle\'s trajectory

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 3(d) shows a log-log plot of optimal mean reward vs. travel distance for Pareto distributed rewards. What does the slope of the plotted line represent?
choices: The average reward associated with each target
The intensity of the Poisson point process generating target locations
The growth rate of the mean reward with travel distance
The parameter α of the Pareto distribution
